name: Origami Accounting
tag_list: accountants-edmonton, small-business-accounting-edmonton, bookkeeping-edmonton, edmonton-bookkeepers, tax-services-edmonton, tax-preparation-edmonton, accounting-services-edmonton, small-business-accountants-edmonton, accounting-firm-edmonton, tax-account
overview: Origami Accounting is a complete small business bookkeeping and accounting service. For a flat monthly fee, we provide monthly bookkeeping, monthly financial statements, GST remittances, payroll, CRA correspondence, annual financial statements, annual corporate tax returns, and ongoing advice from a Chartered Accountant.
